<!-- source-hash: 87bdb7463fac2e0058ae7d784fec0349 -->
A Spring Boot application entry point for the OpenFrame external API service that configures component scanning across multiple OpenFrame modules.

## Key Components

- **ExternalApiApplication** - Main application class annotated with `@SpringBootApplication`
- **Component Scanning** - Configured to scan packages across external, data, core, api, and kafka modules
- **Spring Boot Entry Point** - Standard `main` method to bootstrap the application

## Package Structure

The application scans the following OpenFrame modules:
- `com.openframe.external` - External API specific components
- `com.openframe.data` - Data access layer components  
- `com.openframe.core` - Core business logic components
- `com.openframe.api` - Shared API components
- `com.openframe.kafka` - Kafka messaging components

## Usage Example

```java
// Run the application
public static void main(String[] args) {
    SpringApplication.run(ExternalApiApplication.class, args);
}

// The application will automatically discover and register
// all Spring components from the configured packages
```

This modular approach allows the external API service to leverage shared components across the OpenFrame platform while maintaining separation of concerns between different functional areas.
